data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Hongyu, Wang, Bo, Liu, Xingyue (2019): First description of the male of Cretaconiopteryx grandis Liu & Lu, 2017 (Neuroptera: Coniopterygidae) from the Cretaceous Burmese amber. Zootaxa 4674 (4): 482-490, DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.4674.4.7|2 occurrences
